testcase.classname: showcasing BDD framework using wpmobile ecommerce site
testcase.name: To place an order from wpmobilePack
testcase.system-out: Given i have privileges to access wpmobilePack site.........................passed When i select product "Patient Ninja" from home.............................passed And add the selected product to cart "Patient Ninja was added to your shopping cart".passed Then go to checkout page , fill the required fields and place the order.....passed Then order has been successfully placed "Order received"....................passed
